text: The men's 5000 metres event at the 1998 World Junior Championships in Athletics was held in Annecy, France, at Parc des Sports on 31 July and 2 August. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; " width="35%" |- |bgcolor="gold"|Gold|| Million Wolde ' |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver|| Kipchumba Mitei ' |- |bgcolor="CC9966"|Bronze|| Reuben Kamzee ' |} ==Results== ===Final=== 2 August {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !!
